mapper.select: SELECT MIN(PRICE_DATE) as PRICE_DATE, ROUND(AVG(AVG_PRICE), 2) as AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE PRICE_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND OIL_CATEGORY = #{oilCategory} AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ORDER BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE) ASC, MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ASC

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(PRICE_DATE), '-01-01') as PRICE_DATE, ROUND(AVG(AVG_PRICE), 2) as AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE PRICE_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) AND OIL_CATEGORY = #{oilCategory} AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE) ORDER BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE) ASC
SELECT OIL_CATEGORY, AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE PRICE_DATE = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND AREA_NAME = "전국"
